views.markdown:
-Some random bug fixes -Ads should now be much less annoying
-Changed the way crash handler hooks so that crash reporter has less false positives
-Fixes thumbnail downloading on YT ++ and various other bug fixes -Various Bug fixes -Moved files to /var/lib/misc to save space for 9.3.x JB
-This update should also fix those random crashes users of Twitter ++ were having
-Fix payments again :)
-Fixed crash handler for snapchat
-Fixing the tweet to remove ads function version: 2.0r-80
change-log:
- Payments now done through PayPal web view for ad removal
- Fix bug that caused Vine and Twitter apps to crash
-If a ++ tweak causes your app to crash on launch the tweak will automatically be detected and the tweak will be disabled :) -Due to Parse.com being discontinued by Facebook I have had to re-write my backend services as such this is a major update. If you have purchased ad-removal before please make sure to login again from “++ Settings -> Ad Removal Settings”

-More bug fixes
